forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 11C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 52F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the evening, then mainly cloudy overnight with light rain possible. Low 8C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the evening, then mainly cloudy overnight with light rain possible. Low 46F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.
